channel.title: Some Problems with my server
channel.description: Well, I Am using Agents DDSSpecced 317 server, and I do not know the code for making NPC's automatically say something and how to make some NPC's do certain amount of damage and I don't know how to make them drop certain items upon death. Any codes and where to put them would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Some Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

client…? i said npchandler <.<

Read full topic

Uh I can’t find the moo and when I put the string at the end of the client the NPC doesn’t talk D:

Read full topic

item.title: Some Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

Making Npcs talk is simple; difficulty is like 0.0001/10 lol open up npchandler.java and search for “moo” on all severs it will have a cow as default for moo.
Under this you would add:
if (npcs[i].npcType == (IDHERE) {
if (misc.random(100) == 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “NPCMESSAGEHERE”;
}
Any problems with this… let me know

Read full topic
